nodes.text: The Rang Clan, sometimes refered to as the Rangs, was a criminal organization that was active during the Clone Wars. The Volpai Moregi embezzled from the group, leading the clan to place a hefty bounty on his head.

In 10 BBY, the Rang Clan was a rival of Crimson Dawn and hired Kara Safwan to spy and gather intel on Crimson Dawn operations. The Rang Clan was still active four years before the Battle of Yavin, and placed a bounty on the pirate Hondo Ohnaka.
"Rangs" were first mentioned in a video of an unfinished gameplay demo for the now-cancelled video game Star Wars: 1313, released in 2012 at the video game conference Gamescom.
